attributes.action: recommend kenny dalglish for a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: kenny was not only a great footballer,and manager.he has done great work helping people

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
